Introduction

Pyo Ji Hoon, also known as P.O, is a South Korean Rapper and TV Personality best known for being the deep-voiced Maknae of the boy group Block B under Seven Seasons Entertainment.

After many years of being a rapper, P.O started appearing in variety shows and even starring in the drama "Hotel del Luna" (2019)
